document.full_text: pakistan now seems ready to allow the united states to interview the wives of osama bin laden who were with the al qaeda leader when he was killed last week, a u.s. official familiar with the matter said on monday.
document.title: pakistan may grant u.s. access to bin laden's wives
lines_and_colors: pakistan now seems ready to allow the united states to interview the wives of osama bin laden who were with the al qaeda leader when he was killed last week, a u.s. official familiar with the matter said on monday.
